lines.author: Peter Borden
lines.quote: Most advances in science come when a person for one reason or another is forced to change fields.

lines.author: Albert Einstein
lines.quote: As far as the laws of mathematics refer to reality, they are not certain; and as far as they are certain, they do not refer to reality.

lines.author: Mary Caroline Davies
lines.quote: May I forget what ought to be forgotten; and recall, unfailing, all that ought to be recalled, each kindly thing, forgetting what might sting.

lines.author: Charlotte Bronte
lines.quote: I try to avoid looking backward and keep looking upward.

lines.author: Sophie Scholl
lines.quote: The real damage is done by those millions who want to 'survive.' The honest men who just want to be left in peace. [...] Safe?! From what? Life is always on the edge of death; [...] a little candle burns itself out just like a flaming torch does. I choose my own way to burn.

lines.author: Irish toast
lines.quote: May your glass be ever full. May the roof over your head be always strong. And may you be in heaven half an hour before the devil knows you're dead.

lines.author: W. Emerson
lines.quote: I cannot remember the books I've read any more than the meals I have eaten; even so, they have made me.

lines.author: D. Rupert
lines.quote: The goal of a book isn’t to get to the last page, it’s to expand your thinking.

lines.author: Gordon Atkinson
lines.quote: One thing is clear to me. You can't know everything you'd like to know. You can't do everything you'd like to do. You can't read everything you'd like to read. You must hold onto some things and let go of others. Learning to make that choice is one of the big lessons of this life.

lines.author: Henry David Thoreau
lines.quote: There is no remedy for love but to love more.

lines.author: Sara June Parker
lines.quote: May I never miss a sunset or a rainbow because I am looking down.

lines.author: Murray Bookchin
lines.quote: If we do not do the impossible, we shall be faced with the unthinkable.

lines.author: Murray Bookchin
lines.quote: We are part of nature, a product of a long evolutionary journey. To some degree, we carry the ancient oceans in our blood. … Our brains and nervous systems did not suddenly spring into existence without long antecedents in natural history.

lines.author: Murray Bookchin
lines.quote: That which we most prize as integral to our humanity - our extraordinary capacity to think on complex conceptual levels - can be traced back to the nerve network of primitive invertebrates, the ganglia of a mollusk, the spinal cord of a fish, the brain of an amphibian, and the cerebral cortex of a primate.

lines.author: Patricia Russel-McCloud
lines.quote: Life is an escalator: You can move forward or backward; you can not remain still.

lines.author: Ekko
lines.quote: Sometimes taking a leap forward means leaving a few things behind.

lines.author: Frank Underwood
lines.quote: If you don't like how the table is set, turn over the table.
The world is cruel, therefore I won't be
Just because I can survive harsh conditions, doesn't mean I should have to.

lines.author: Donald Glover
lines.quote: I know I'm the shit. I put in the work. And my idea of what is cool is a better road for everybody
Wasting time with you has been the biggest joy in my life.
You can easily return to the past, but no one is there anymore
Dream big, eat well, fuck loud.

lines.author: Antonio Gramsci
lines.quote: The challenge of modernity is to live without illusions and without becoming disillusioned.

lines.author: Frederich Nietzche
lines.quote: They muddy the water, to make it seem deep.
The only way out is through.
There is nowhere to go but everywhere. So just keep rolling under the star.

lines.author: Coach K
lines.quote: Learn how to listen. You’re not gonna learn with you just talking.

lines.author: Lisa Alther
lines.quote: I happen to feel that the degree of a person's intelligence is directly reflected by the number of conflicting attitudes she can bring to bear on the same topic.

lines.author: Ella Wheeler Wilcox
lines.quote: Love much. Earth has enough of bitter in it.

lines.author: Hunter S. Thompson
lines.quote: I hate to advocate drugs, alcohol, violence, or insanity to anyone, but they've always worked for me.

lines.author: Larry Kramer
lines.quote: The bigger you get, the more cowardly you become; the more money you receive, the more self satisfied you are

lines.author: Amilcar Cabral
lines.quote: Always Bear in mind that the people are not fighting for ideas, for the thnigs in anyone's head. They are fighting to win material benefits, to live better and in peace, to see their lives go forward, to guarantee the future of their children

lines.author: Valérie Rey Robert
lines.quote: Nous devons arreter de croire que le sexisme est un probleme de femmes; les hommes ent sont les principaux auteurs, ils ont donc collectivement la responsabilité d'y mettre fin.
Chaque année 94000 femmes sont victimes de viols, 98% des auteurs sont des hommes.
EN FRANCE UNE FEMME MEURT TOUT LES TROIS JOURS SOUS LES COUPS DE SON CONJOINT

lines.author: Valérie Rey Robert
lines.quote: J'ai eu beaucoup de mal à écrire ce chapitre parceque la seule chose que j'avais envie d'écrire aux hommes tenait en quelques mots : Fermez la, Ecoutez nous, Arretez d'être lache face au sexisme, Arretez d'agresser sexuellement.

lines.author: Murray Bookchin
lines.quote: The assumption that what currently exists must necessarily exist is the acid that corrodes all visionary thinking.

lines.author: Murray Bookchin
lines.quote: There are no hierarchies in nature other than those imposed by hierarchical modes of human thought, but rather differences merely in function between and within living things.

lines.author: Murray Bookchin
lines.quote: What compels me to fight this society is, of course, outrage over injustice, a love of freedom, and a feeling of responsibility for perpetuating and enlarging the human spirit — its beauty, creativity, and latent capacity to improve the world.

lines.author: Murray Bookchin
lines.quote: I do not care to come to terms with an irrational society that corrodes all that is valuable in humanity, that eats away at all that is beautiful and noble in the human experience.

lines.author: Murray Bookchin
lines.quote: We must consciously create our own world, not according to mindless customs and destructive prejudices, but according to the canons of reason, reflection, and discourse that uniquely belong to our own species.

lines.author: Murray Bookchin
lines.quote: There can be no separation of the revolutionary process from the revolutionary goal. A society based on self-administration must be achieved by means of self-administration.

lines.author: Murray Bookchin
lines.quote: An anarchist society, far from being a remote ideal, has become a precondition for the practice of ecological principles.

lines.author: Murray Bookchin
lines.quote: We are confronted with the need not simply to improve society or alter it; we are confronted with the need to remake it.

lines.author: Murray Bookchin
lines.quote: The great project of our time must be to open the other eye: to see all-sidedly and wholly, to heal and transcend the cleavage between humanity and nature.

lines.author: Rosa Luxembourg
lines.quote: The most revolutionnary thing one can do is always to proclaim loudly what is happening.

lines.author: Chaia Heller
lines.quote: It is time for "nature" to be bhrought down to earth, to become the very stuff of our lives: the crowded street in our neighborhood, the water with which we wash our clothes, both sky scraper and smoke-stack, as well as the plants, animals, and  other creatures with whome we share the planet.

lines.author: Chaia Heller
lines.quote: Ecology must become the dfesire to infuse the objects, relationships, and practices of everyday life with the same quality of integrity, beauty, and meaning that people [...] commonly reserve for "nature".

lines.author: Donald Knuth
lines.quote: To program is to write to another programmer about our solutions to a problem

lines.author: Donald Knuth
lines.quote: In fact what I would like to see is thousands of computer scientis let loose to do whatever they want. THat's what really advances the field.

lines.author: Irish toast (and James (then Garrus))
lines.quote: May your glass be ever full. May the roof over your head be always strong. And may you be in heaven half an hour before the devil knows you're dead.

lines.author: Javik
lines.quote: Stand in the ashes of a trillion dead souls and ask their ghosts if honour matters. Their silence will be your answer.

lines.author: Nassana
lines.quote: Shepard... but... youre dead ?!

lines.author: Shepard
lines.quote: I got better!

lines.author: Shepard
lines.quote: I should go.

lines.author: Shepard
lines.quote: I'm sorry I can't hear you, I'm getting a lot of bullshit on this line.

lines.author: Shepard
lines.quote: Nobody ever fell in love without being a little bit brave.

lines.author: Tank bred krogan
lines.quote: I am not perfect, but I have purpose.

lines.author: Anderson
lines.quote: You did good, son. You did good. I’m proud of you.

lines.author: Wrex Urdnot
lines.quote: You are a champion to the Krogan people, a friend of Clan Urdnot, and a brother to me. To every Krogan born after this day, the name 'Shepard' will mean 'Hero'! Now, let's show them why!

lines.author: Jack
lines.quote: Turns out, mess with someone's head enough, you can turn a scared little kid into an all-powerful bitch.

lines.author: Jeff "Joker" Moreau
lines.quote: I don't trust anyone who makes more than I do

lines.author: Wrex Udnot
lines.quote: Better than I’d feared. Worse than I’d hoped.

lines.author: Shepard
lines.quote: I won't let fear comprise who I am.

lines.author: Major Kirrahe
lines.quote: We held the line.

lines.author: Mordin
lines.quote: Cultural artistic expression reflects philosophical evolution, interest in growth- perspective, observation, interpretation. Suspect you won't see any art in collector base. Culturally dead; tools for the reapers. Worse than death.

lines.author: Eve
lines.quote: There is no other reason to exist other than the hope the next day will bring change. And if it doesn't, there is always the next.

lines.author: Charr
lines.quote: Let my broken bones build a wall around your garden, so you and the flower we planted together can grow safe and strong.

lines.author: Tali'Zorah
lines.quote: After time adrift among open stars, among tides of light and to shoals of dust, I will return to where I began.

lines.author: Samara
lines.quote: Only your actions will be remembered, choose them well.

lines.author: Shepard
lines.quote: But take heart! Look around you! You're not in this fight alone. We face our enemy together, and together, we will defeat them!

lines.author: Liara T'Soni
lines.quote: I've always lived for the pursuit of knowledge - whatever form that may take. Information is just one of many, and it's a valuable commodity.

lines.author: Shepard
lines.quote: You're not even alive. Not really. You're just a machine. And machines can be broken!

lines.author: Garrus
lines.quote: It's so much easier to see the world in black and white. Gray... I don't know what to do with gray.

lines.author: Garrus
lines.quote: Are you kidding? I'm right behind you.

lines.author: Kaidan Alenko
lines.quote: But sometimes the way a thing goes down does matter, Shepard. Later, when you have to live with yourself. Knowing that you acted with integrity--then it matters.

lines.author: CSec officer
lines.quote: Do you want me to arrest you ?

lines.author: Wrex
lines.quote: I want you to try.

lines.author: Wrex
lines.quote: We’re both warrior Shepard. Out of respect I want to warn you, I’m going to kill Fisk

lines.author: Wrex
lines.quote: If I die in here, I’ll kill him

lines.author: Wrex
lines.quote: Anything that isn’t constantly challenged grows weak

lines.author: Liara T'Soni
lines.quote: You humans are creatures of action. You pursue your goals with an almost indomitable determination. It is an admirable trait, but also an intimidating one.

lines.author: Jacob Taylor
lines.quote: The more good you do, the less they want to admit something needed doing.

lines.author: Samara
lines.quote: I am a ruined vessel of sorrow and regret, but I am free.

lines.author: Jack
lines.quote: So fuck you and thanks for asking.

lines.author: Shepard
lines.quote: Words mean nothing until you put them into action.

lines.author: Shepard
lines.quote: Some people think asking for help is a sign of weakness. That's just being stupid and stubborn. No matter how strong you are, allies can make you stronger.

lines.author: Jack
lines.quote: Shit you sound like a pussy

lines.author: Jack
lines.quote: I don’t care. I’m out to survive it, then cut loose

lines.author: Jack
lines.quote: Rough stuff. I like it.

lines.author: Jack
lines.quote: Whatever you say, Boss man

lines.author: Tali'Zorah
lines.quote: Give me a scrap of metal, a microprocessor, and I’ll make it do precision jump

lines.author: Jack
lines.quote: Dead is dead. There’s no such things as a good way to go.

lines.author: Jack
lines.quote: I don’t care. I’m out to survive it, then cut loose

lines.author: Tali'Zorah
lines.quote: I don’t think life is about what you deserve.

lines.author: Wrex
lines.quote: What a kick in the quad

lines.author: Thane
lines.quote: We must carry the weight of our decisions Shepard.

lines.author: Tali'Zorah
lines.quote: Im as free as the dust in the solar wind

lines.author: Shepard
lines.quote: I'm only slow cause I'm not running

lines.author: Shepard
lines.quote: I need to know someone is getting out of this alive.

lines.author: Wrex
lines.quote: You look well for dead, Shepard. Should have known the void couldn't hold you.

lines.author: Wrex
lines.quote: Now we can get back to doing what krogan do best: saving everyone else from giant monsters.

lines.author: Tali'Zorah
lines.quote: The Pilgrimage proves we are willing to give of ourselves for the greater good. What does it say about me if I turn my back on this?

lines.author: Tali'Zorah
lines.quote: We're family. This is just the worst kind of family meeting.

lines.author: Jeff "Joker" Moreau
lines.quote: I’m not good. I’m not even great. I’m the best damn helmsman in the Alliance fleet.

lines.author: Jack
lines.quote: You know what it's like... to think you're alone and find out you're not?

lines.author: Grunt
lines.quote: I don't like this. Fury is my choice, not a sickness.

lines.author: Grunt
lines.quote: SHEPERD S HEPAURD  SHEPARUD!!!

lines.author: Jacob Taylor
lines.quote: I guess I just got tired of never making a difference.

lines.author: Jacob Taylor
lines.quote: If these are our final days, I want to spend them protecting these people.

lines.author: Legion
lines.quote: How could we have become so different? Why can we no longer understand each other? What did we do wrong?

lines.author: Mordin Solus
lines.quote: Lots of ways to help people. Sometimes heal patients; sometimes execute dangerous people. Either way helps.

lines.author: Thane Krios
lines.quote: The measure of an individual can be difficult to discern by actions alone.

lines.author: Aria T'loak
lines.quote: I'm back, you fuckers.

lines.author: Kelly Chambers
lines.quote: Character matters, not race or gender.

lines.author: Eve
lines.quote: In the darkest hour, there is always a way out.

lines.author: Zaal'Koris vas Qwib-Qwib
lines.quote: I would argue that the best hope for our people is not to be destroyed in a senseless war. But I fear I am in the minority.

lines.author: Samantha Traynor
lines.quote: If flagging your messages and managing strategic intel helps you in any way, then it's worth it.

lines.author: Cora Harper
lines.quote: Things feel better, though they don't feel fixed yet. Remember to take time for yourself, too. Work's important, but so is time to grieve.

lines.author: S. Theris, "Twelve Leaves", verse 132
lines.quote: Grief and fear cannot rule you; let them be your faithful servants, protective of their mistress. Loss serves a huntress like fuel serves fire.

lines.author: Cora Harper
lines.quote: The razor's edge between known and unknown teaches you what can be cut away.

lines.author: Drack Nakmor
lines.quote: This usually helps me: (Drack has attached 37 images of various rifles and shotguns. Two are duplicate images. Many are low-res or watermarked.)

lines.author: Peebee
lines.quote: The Milky Way was so... been-there-done-that. Even if I hadn't done it, someone had.

lines.author: Liam Kosta
lines.quote: I believed in a new beginning. Still do. I have to. We're in it.

lines.author: Vetra Nyx
lines.quote: What I'm saying is, different's not always better. I don't regret anything—or what I've done to get where I am.

lines.author: Alec Ryder
lines.quote: Every great moment in our history began with a dream.

lines.author: Alec Ryder
lines.quote: When your back is against the wall, use it.

lines.author: Garrus
lines.quote: We should record this and broadcast this to the reapers. They'll either run away, melt down, or fall in love.

lines.author: Wrex
lines.quote: Ah, next you'll be going on about how the strong aren't supposed to eat the weak. But everybody's weaker than me! What am I supposed to eat for lunch?

lines.author: Shepard
lines.quote: People are messy, awkward, sometimes selfish or cruel. But they're trying. And I'm going to make sure they have a chance

lines.author: Garrus
lines.quote: I just don't see the point in staying quiet and polite. Not when the galaxy is at stake.

lines.author: Morinth
lines.quote: Look into my eyes and tell me you want me. Tell me you'd kill for me. Anything I want.

lines.author: Grunt
lines.quote: We'll push our ennemies to the edge of space, then steps on their fingers one at a time until the void takes them.

lines.author: Jack
lines.quote: Rather do it to them first.

lines.author: Shepard
lines.quote: I have a lot to live for.

lines.author: Shepard
lines.quote: You've got to fight. We need you in this.

lines.author: Dr. Karin Chakwas
lines.quote: We didn't work for them, we used them. If I were to feel anything it would be guilt.

lines.author: Shepard
lines.quote: Yeah, I don't know Garrus. But I'm sure as hell gonna give it my best shot.

lines.author: Admiral Hackett
lines.quote: So I'll find their soft spots, avoid them where they're stong, and hit them when they're not.

lines.author: Garrus
lines.quote: Yell loud enough, and someone will eventually come over to see what all the fuss is about.

lines.author: Jack
lines.quote: I had no idea the king of the Boy Scout would show up.

lines.author: Wrex
lines.quote: Now we can get back to doing what krogan do best - Saving everyone from giant monsters.

lines.author: Major Kirrahe
lines.quote: Always expect trouble, failing that create trouble for someone else.

lines.author: Shiala
lines.quote: Our every action ripples through time, touching generations in ways we cannot hope to fathom.

lines.author: Tali'Zorah
lines.quote: Keelah se'lai.

lines.author: Garrus
lines.quote: We've had a hell of a ride, haven't we ?

lines.author: Shepard
lines.quote: Times like these, you know who your real friends are. They're not the ones running around looking for an escape route. They're the one who stand at your side through the worst of it, who never give up on you.

lines.author: Garrus
lines.quote: You're not going to propose marriage now are you ?

lines.author: Shepard
lines.quote: Nobody is giving up. Not those turians. Not me. Not you.

lines.author: Cortez
lines.quote: If anyone can pull this all together, it's you. And I'm with you.

lines.author: Anderson
lines.quote: No matter how good you think you are, there's always somebody quicker, faster and a helluva lot smarter than you around the corner.

lines.author: Liara
lines.quote: I spend so much time chasing knowledge. Sometimes I forget that there are things you learn by doing nothing. By just spending time with the people you care about.

lines.author: Jack
lines.quote: Hey, you look like shit.

lines.author: Kolyat
lines.quote: When I was little I thought my father had it all figured out. He said men must be loyal to their friends and dangerous to their enemies. But when he prevented me from... from hurting someone,  he had changed. He said ennemies and ego are not as important as loved ones.

lines.author: Charr
lines.quote: My dream was to be by your side, a weed beside your beauty, twinning together in the warm Tuchanka sun.

lines.author: Tali'Zorah
lines.quote: You fought when no one else would. When nobody else believed you. You can do this. I know you can.

lines.author: Garrus
lines.quote: Before your friend picks you up, dusts you off, and tells you you're the best damned soldier he's ever met.

lines.author: Garrus
lines.quote: I've lost a few fights in my time - and i'm still here. It's because I always made sur the next one belonged to me. And the one after that.

lines.author: James
lines.quote: You need to cut yourself some slack. Whatever it takes to get that data back from Cerberus, we're behind you.

lines.author: Shepard
lines.quote: We can't ignore that people are dying. The Reapers have no mercy, but we do.

lines.author: Cortez
lines.quote: Hell no. I'm not just any shuttle pilot. I'm your shuttle pilot. Wouldn't have it any other way.

lines.author: Grunt
lines.quote: I don't know. Drank a bit, left the hospital, broke a few windows.

lines.author: Grunt
lines.quote: Heh heh heh

lines.author: Shepard
lines.quote: You want me to sit there and watch you cook ?

lines.author: Kaidan Alenko
lines.quote: You're not watching me cook. You're helping me drink beer. Now sit your ass down.

lines.author: Shepard
lines.quote: So remember how I saved the Citadel? And then -you weren't there- I survived a suicide mission ? All these close calls I've had only to be taken out by dinner.

lines.author: Tali'Zorah
lines.quote: When do we get to stop reacting to our parents and start living for ourselves?

lines.author: Jack
lines.quote: You're getting this. Hope you like it, 'cause it's too late now.

lines.author: Grunt
lines.quote: Ever seen a krogan drink so much they get sick on your floor? I'm here to make sure that dream comes true!

lines.author: Jack
lines.quote: Oh that's just fuckin perfect. Did it occurs to you that maybe I'm trying to grow as a goddamn person?

lines.author: Samara
lines.quote: You know, Zaeed, there's nothing wrong with silence between two friends.

lines.author: Jack
lines.quote: I still really hate you, but you have fantastic tits.

lines.author: Miranda
lines.quote: All right. I can live with this.

lines.author: Jack
lines.quote: Knock that shit off. You're gonna blow the Reapers to hell. And then you're coming back and taking me out dancing

lines.author: Jack
lines.quote: You know, for all the shit we've been through, we've had a damn good ride.

lines.author: Shepard
lines.quote: The best.

lines.author: Shepard
lines.quote: I don't know how it's going to end, but whatever happens...

lines.author: Jeff "Joker" Moreau
lines.quote: What do you mean, whatever happens? Everyone knows what's going to happen. You're gonna kick some Reaper ass. That's what you do. And I'll be flying you there in style.

lines.author: Diana Allers
lines.quote: The laughing part is important. I want you to make it all normal again, Shepard. Because that's the best revenge I can think of.

lines.author: Shepard
lines.quote: But that fear's gonna keep me alive long enough to strike these bastards right through the heart.

lines.author: Shepard
lines.quote: Sure, everything will change - but on our terms. We've been running until now, Miranda. It has to stop.

lines.author: Jack
lines.quote: Don't get killed dumbass. When this is over, I'm getting laid.

lines.author: Shepard
lines.quote: I love you, too.

lines.author: Garrus
lines.quote: No, I think we're about to kick the Reapers back into whatever black hole they crawled out of. Then we're going to retire somewhere warm and tropical and live off the royalties from the vids.

lines.author: Garrus
lines.quote: Forgive the insubordination, but this old friend has an order for you... Go out ther and give them hell. You were born to do this.

lines.author: Liara
lines.quote: I just know I'll have a clever line five minute from now.

lines.author: Wrex
lines.quote: One word beat the monsters back to the abyss, and one word brought death to an ennemy none dared fight! That word was "Krogan"! And today the krogan rise again! Today we forge a new path and join the galaxies as allies in victory! Today... We win our future!

lines.author: Javik
lines.quote: The future is still out there. It is something my people could never say: there will be a tomorrow.

lines.author: Javik
lines.quote: You are now the avatar of this cycle. The exemplar of victory. Not just for humanity, or turians, or protheans - but for all life. Every soul that has ever existed is watching this moment.

lines.author: Shepard
lines.quote: Well, no pressure when you put it that way.

lines.author: Javik
lines.quote: Do not waver. Victory is never won without difficult choices.

lines.author: Samara
lines.quote: Reflecting on one's place in the universe while a party rages within reach can feel oddly self-affirming.

lines.author: Samantha Traynor
lines.quote: Not with that voice! It's like feeling smoky satin slide accross your skin in soft candlelight.

lines.author: Shepard
lines.quote: Come on, Liara. You've seen the data. Even if we win, you and I won't live to see the parade.

lines.author: Liara
lines.quote: Then what's the damn point? Of drinks... or... any of it... if we could all die tomorrow?

lines.author: Shepard
lines.quote: It's not tomorrow yet.

lines.author: Miles Morales
lines.quote: Nah, Imma do my own thing.

lines.author: Yoda
lines.quote: Do or do not, there's no try.
The club is bumping. The ladies look good. The alcohol is flowing. There's much pain in this world but not in this room.
jgarde le smile malgré les épreuves... #battante #CONbattante #lavieestunepute

lines.author: joshcarlosjosh
lines.quote: "I wish it need not have happened in my time," said Frodo. "lmao" said Gandalf, "well it has."

lines.author: J.R.R. Tolkien
lines.quote: "I wish it need not have happened in my time," said Frodo. "So do I," said Gandalf, "and so do all who live to see such times. But that is not for them to decide. All we have to decide is what to do with the time that is given us."

lines.author: J.R.R. Tolkien
lines.quote: If more of us valued food and cheer and song above hoarded gold, it would be a merrier world.

lines.author: J.R.R. Tolkien
lines.quote: Deserves it! I daresay he does. Many that live deserve death. And some that die deserve life. Can you give it to them? Then do not be too eager to deal out death in judgement. For even the very wise cannot see all ends.

lines.author: J.R.R. Tolkien
lines.quote: And he took her in his arms and kissed her under the sunlit sky, and he cared not that they stood high upon the walls in the sight of many.

lines.author: J.R.R. Tolkien
lines.quote: Courage is found in unlikely places.

lines.author: J.R.R. Tolkien
lines.quote: So comes snow after fire, and even dragons have their endings.

lines.author: J.R.R. Tolkien
lines.quote: Where there's life there's hope.

lines.author: J.R.R. Tolkien
lines.quote: I do not love the bright sword for its sharpness, nor the arrow for its swiftness, nor the warrior for his glory. I love only that which they defend.

lines.author: Carmen Berzatto
lines.quote: Yes chef. Say it back.

lines.author: Carmen Berzatto
lines.quote: You’re watching the fire and you’re thinking, ‘if I don't do anything…this place will burn down and all my anxiety will go away with it.

lines.author: Luca
lines.quote: You can spend all the time in the world in here, but if you Dont spend enough time out there...

lines.author: Carmen Berzatto
lines.quote: No amount of good is worth how terrible this feels.

lines.author: Richie
lines.quote: This Is A Delicate F*cking Ecosystem!

lines.author: Blackbird Raum
lines.quote: But it won't be the witches that are burning this time.
